Articles.Content: I'm not seeing anywhere that it lists how many times I've orbited. Doing the Campains on the wiki and want to meet the 11 orbit design challenge but don't want to sit and count. Kerbal Alarm Clock doesn't seem to do anything with counts at all either. Any way but visual?

Figure out the time for an orbit by looking at your periapsis or apoapsis marker just after you pass it. Multiply that by the number of orbits you need, and when the MET timer in the upper left passes that number, you are on your final orbit.
